short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter Lazada results to show only items that are shipped from within Thailand.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Filter Lazada search results to show only items that are shipped from within Thailand 
- Simple one-click activation instead of manually ticking all Thai provinces for each search query
- Clean, easy-to-use interface

Instructions:
1. Search on Lazada as normal
2. Click the LT extension in your toolbar, click "Filter Thai Results" button
3. The search results page will be reloaded with the applied filter

Note: This extension only works on www.lazada.co.th
Note: For some search results, Lazada does not enable location filtering. In case nothing happens after button click, please change your search query slightly.
